## Versioning checklist (required before merge)

- [ ] VERSION file updated for affected component
- [ ] README/changelog updated
- [ ] Tests added or updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Backward compatibility considered
- [ ] Breaking change? documented 
- [ ] Migration needed? (if yes, documented)
- [ ] Safe to deploy
